sentence: A good example is Floridas governor, Ron DeSantis, a Republican who last week signed a $1.2 billion tax cut that he said was the largest in state history and would fight inflationary policies imposed on us by the Biden administration.? But a state tax cut, just like a federal spending increase, puts money into consumers pockets.
title: Ron DeSantis Is Being Incoherent on Inflation
